languages.text: В бледном свете люмена сервитор похож на ожившего мертвеца, но ни одна могила не примет человека, ставшего вещью.
In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.
languages.original_text: В бледном свете люмена сервитор похож на ожившего мертвеца, но ни одна могила не примет человека, ставшего вещью.

traits.locale_text: In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor-mortus looks like an animated corpse, but no grave will accept a man who has become a thing.
In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor-mortus looks like an animated corpse, but no grave will accept a man who has become a thing.
In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor-mortus looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a man who has become a thing.
In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor-mortus looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a man who has become a thing.
In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor-mortus looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.
In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.
In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.

languages.text: Im fahlen Licht des Lumen sieht der Servitor wie ein animierter Leichnam aus. Aber kein Grab wird je einen Menschen aufnehmen, der zu einem Ding wurde.
languages.original_text: In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.

traits.locale_text: Im fahlen Licht des Lumen sieht der Servitor-mortus wie ein animierter Leichnam aus. Aber kein Grab wird je einen Menschen aufnehmen, der zu einem Ding wurde.

languages.text: Dans la pâle lueur des lumens, le servitor a tout d'un corps animé, mais nulle tombe n'acceptera sla dépouille d'un humain transformé en monstre.
languages.original_text: In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.

traits.locale_text: Dans la pâle lueur des lumens, le servitor-mortus a tout d'un corps animé, mais nulle tombe n'acceptera jamais la dépouille d'un humain transformé en monstre.

languages.text: Bajo la pálida luz del lumen, el servidor parece un cadáver animado. Pero ninguna tumba aceptaría a un humano que se ha convertido en una cosa.
languages.original_text: In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.

traits.locale_text: Bajo la pálida luz del lumen, el servidor-mortus parece un cadáver animado. Pero ninguna tumba aceptaría a un humano que se ha convertido en una cosa.

languages.text: ルーメンの淡い光の中では、サーヴィターはあたかも生気に満ちた死体のように見える。しかし物と化した人を受け入れる墓はない。
languages.original_text: In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.

traits.locale_text: ルーメンの淡い光の中では、サーヴィター・モータスはあたかも生気に満ちた死体のように見える。しかし物と化した人を受け入れる墓はない。

languages.text: 在流明灯黯淡的光线之下，这个机仆看起来就像一具被复活的尸体一样。不过，没有哪座坟墓会接纳已经被改造成死物的人。
languages.original_text: In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.

traits.locale_text: 在流明灯黯淡的光线之下，死囚机仆看起来就像一具被复活的尸体一样。不过，没有哪座坟墓会接纳已经被改造成物件的人。

languages.text: Hizmetör, lümenin solgun ışığında ayaklanmış bir cesedi andırıyor. Ancak hiçbir kabir, bir şeye dönüşmüş bir insanı kabul etmez.
languages.original_text: In the pale light of the lumen, the servitor looks like an animated corpse. But no grave will ever accept a human who has become a thing.
